page.title: 15Local Artist
page.content: {David Weston} lives at "Lazy Acres,"{Kirby Bellars.}He is a professional artist.He started painting in 1952.He is most famous for his pictures of trains,the first was "Jubilee" locomotive.In the last 15 years he has painted over 500 pictures. It takes him 6-10 hours to do a water colour and 1-3 weeks for an oil painting.Every year he spends 10 weeks painting 6 original works for calendars. He prefers painting landscapes because he enjoys nature.He sometimes paints portraits of important people.All kinds of people buy his paintings.When we asked him he presumed he was good at art at school His other hobbies are woodworking, reading,gardening,collecting antiques and old wood work tools. His tips for budding artists are," Try hard and stick at it!"
